original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says to these bones: I will make breath enter you, and you will come to life.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이 뼈들에게 이같이 말씀하시기를 내가 생기를 너희에게 들어가게 하리니 너희가 살아나리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says
I will make breath enter you,
and you will come to life.
